oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wie wird der Ökolandbau in Europa gefördert?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Padel, Susanne
Lampkin, Nicolas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Why and since when have governments supported organic agriculture? The article introduces the key stages of common agricultural support in Europe and illustrates the key measures and instruments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Padel, Susanne and Lampkin, Nicolas (2014) Wie wird der Ökolandbau in Europa gefördert? [How is organic farming supported in Europe?] Ökologie und Landbau, 171, 171 (3), pp. 12-14.
